courseSummary: In this course, you will learn about how to transform a website designed in Figma or photoshop into a working web application. You will enjoy learning about and using modern web development technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, Git, GitHub, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, SQL and ReactJS. At the end of this module, you will be able to develop and deploy your own portfolio website where you will showcase all your projects you have completed during your study time at Asher Academy. And of course, any other projects you complete on your own and would like prospective employers to know about. Happy coding!!

courseModules.moduleSummary: This is an introductory module for the web development course, mainly for creating the structure of your web application. In this module, you will learn about how to transform a website designed in Figma or photoshop or any other web design technology into a working static web application. There is a lot of typing here, you must be a fast typer, hope you took your typing speed drills. You will enjoy learning how to use the modern standard, HTML5 for creating webpages. We will teach you how to create webpages and join them together to make a website or web application from sratch. We are also going to teach the industry standards and good practices you should follow when writing html markup. Happy coding!!

topicLessons.topicLessonTitle: HTML Syntax and Working with a text editor and browser
topicLessons.topicLessonNotes: In this lesson I will cover the HTM5 syntax and help you get started on working with a text editor and a web browser.

topicLessonTasks.lessonTaskQuestion: What are the two most important software needed to create a webpage?
Most html tags are in pairs

courseModules.moduleSummary: Now that you have master how to create the structure of your website, It's now time to learn about how we can improve the layout and presentation of our website. CSS is basically the tool that you need for this. We will now delve into how css works, looking at it's syntax, as well as other important css3 concepts that will help us make our website look interesting, such as the flexbox concept and the grid concept. Happy coding!!

topicLessons.topicLessonNotes: In this lesson I will cover the CSS syntax and help you get started on styling your website.

topicLessonTasks.lessonTaskQuestion: What are the two most important software needed to create a webpage?
Most html tags are in pairs

courseSummary: Java is used in the development of mobile applications.

courseModules.moduleSummary: This module covers the basics of Java

topicLessons.topicLessonNotes: In this lesson we will install NetBeans or Eclipse to use in Java programming.
